summary:
I am a senior geospatial engineer and certified IHO/ FIG/ ICA Hydrographic surveyor with experience on multimillion euro projects in the United Arab Emirates, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the EU. The projects I have dealt with range from marine, Infrastructure and airports construction to 3D laser scanning, bathymetric surveys, heritage mapping (UNESCO), defense mapping, drone surveys and digital twins of city scale projects for commercial real estate and construction management. Additionally I have extensive experience in managing various stakeholders (client and main contractor perspective). 
Moreover, I possess authorized in person training and certification (directly from the software companies) on several software packages such as ESRI's City Engine and ArcGIS (online / desktop / mobile apps), QPS Qinsy, Fledermaus and Qimera as well as FME, Leica Cyclone Register, Autodesk Civil 3D and Revit (Architecture). 
Additionally, I have led the development of large fixed wing drones and USVs purposely built for construction digitalization, bathymetric surveys and country scale mapping. applications. Finally, I am Certified commercial drone operator for the United Arab Emirates (DCAA , GCAA) and Europe (EASA).

Yas island Zone K Infrastructure project(WEST YAS),Abu Dhabi
projects.description:
The Zone K Residential Community will be a premier community for U.A.E National citizens. The development is a key part of delivering the emirate’s Vision 2030 plan to deliver high quality housing for Emirati families.

 Inside this natural mangrove lined site, boasting a pristine white beach and crystal clear turquoise waters the development will include around 1,250 homes and three neighborhood centres, designed and set in a landscape which is sympathetic to the traditions of the Emirati culture. The master plan also has a strong sustainability objective and has achieved a 2 Pearl Estidama Community Rating.

 The design of the community is based on the traditional ‘fareej’ (neighborhood) structure, linked with ‘sikkas’ (pedestrian connections) and ‘barahas’ (central gathering spaces) creating private family homes linked through a shaded network of pathways and local parks. From the outset this project has been about culturally responsive design – creating sustainable communities that respect the Emirati way of life.

 The Yas Zone K Abu Dhabi infrastructure project (126.000.000 Euros) is under construction by Athena Emirates L.L.C. (J&P AVAX) with client Aldar and inspection by Parsons international. Project management by KBR. Also in the project: MottMacDonald, Hallcrow, Citiscape and many more.

projects.title: Moray West Offshore Wind Farm Project
projects.description:
ollowing the award of seabed rights from The Crown Estate the development phase for the Moray West offshore wind farm commenced in 2016 with site specific surveys leading to applications for marine and onshore consents. All necessary consents were secured in early 2019.

Following further surveys, design and procurement activity the project will consist of:
1. 60 wind turbines each with a generating capacity of 14.7 megawatts (MW) i.e. generating capacity of 882 MW
2. Associated substructures and monopile foundations
Inter-array cables
3. Two Offshore Substation Platforms
4. Two Offshore export cable circuits
5. Onshore cable jointing bays and cabling for two underground circuits from landfall to Whitehillock
6. Onshore substation at Whitehillock
7. Onshore underground cabling between Whitehillock substation and Blackhillock substation

projects.title: Ostwind2
projects.description:
The contract comprises supply and installation of approximately 270 kilometers of 220 kV high-voltage AC XLPE offshore export cable system, and approximately 8 kilometers of 220 kV high-voltage AC XLPE onshore cable system.

NKT contract for the supply of the cables carries a value of some €300 million, while Boskalis will receive in excess of €250 million for the installation part, making this the largest export cable project for both companies.

The export cable system for Ostwind 2 will be manufactured both in Karlskrona, Sweden, and in Cologne, Germany, with production start beginning of 2020.

For this project Boskalis will deliver an integrated solution of in-house services including supporting UXO survey, geotechnical and geophysical surveys (through Boskalis subsidiary Gardline), seabed preparation works, pre-lay run, transport and installation of the 220kV export cables and seabed reinstatement.

The wind farms connected via the Ostwind 2 grid connection, which is expected to be fully commissioned in end-2022, will be located approximately 40 kilometers northeast of the German Island of Rügen in the Baltic Sea.

projects.title: Scarborough Gas (LNG) - Offshore
projects.description: The Scarborough gas project – a $16bn liquified natural gas (LNG) project off the coast of Western Australia (WA) – stands as a significant development in the country’s energy future. Scqrborough is Australia’s largest fossil fuel project in the past decade.

profile_positions.description:
1. Leading technical demonstrations of Propeller (Trimble Stratus) construction digitalization platform in person with the customers and at international construction exhibitions.
2. Provide geospatial technical training of the software / hardware and construction digitalization / monitoring workflows to all EMEA resellers.
3. Supporting customer support on large projects such as HS2(UK).
profile_positions.title: Senior Survey Engineer, technical sales EMEA

profile_positions.description:
1.	Providing strategic advice to CEO regarding digital transformation technology innovations.
2.	Management of all the company’s innovation projects.
3.	Ensuring company policies and legal guidelines are followed.
4.	Led the design and manufacturing of 2 large, fixed wing UAVs (digital twin generation) and one USV (MBES, hydrographic survey purposes).
5.	Responsible for Alphageo’s GIS data management and data sharing via the company's digital online platform (online GIS).
6.	Responsible for the company’s laser scanning hardware and software purchases.
7.	Registered the company to all governmental portals in the United Arab Emirates.
8.	Performance management of the company’s personnel.
9.	Showcasing Alphageo’s geospatial innovations to several conferences and exhibitions
profile_positions.title: Chief Technology Officer and Managing Partner

profile_positions.description:
1. Managed JLL’s digital solutions teams for the successful delivery of digital transformation of King Abdullah Financial District digitization for real estate management (KAFD, Riyadh, KSA). 
2. In charge of MISK City development digital twin and 3D GIS Database for future urban planning and real estate and public space management using ESRI’s ArcGIS PRO and ESRI’s City Engine. 
3. Managed JLL’s MENA ArcGIS online portal.
4. Managed JLL’s drone surveys (KAFD, MISK) and digital twin / BIM integration to our online G.I.S. Deliverable.
5. Established 4 in-house 3D laser scanning teams for KAFD laser scanning and minimized the cost of the project significantly (3.5Million euros) by replacing the scanning subcontractor (3.5 million square meters of indoor scanning and 1 million square meters of outdoor scanning in total).
6. ArcGIS dashboard creation for several JLL projects.
7. Leading JLL's G.I.S. Data capture using ESRI's mobile apps. Trained JLL’s site personnel on ESRI’s mobile applications.
8. In charge of the 3D Laser scanning of the new Heriot Watt building complex, new PETRONAS office, Australian Embassy in KSA, Dubai Expo 2020 mall and several fit-out projects.
9. Assisted digital Solutions’ head in Quotation preparation, report writing and proposals.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager | Geospatial lead MENA, Digital Solutions, P&DS

profile_positions.description:
•	Successfully Delivered survey and GIS database for Siemens IoT defense Devices (Rheinmetall Defense, Military Facility at Ruwais U.A.E.).
•	In charge of Drone Aerial Survey and Laser Scanning of Khor Fakkan Heritage Site and Al Hili Archaeological Area (UNESCO), as well as scanning and reverse engineering (Rhino 6) of several Racing Boats.
•	Project Planning and Management of Laser Scanning of Marina Mall and Emirates Palace Laser Scanning Abu Dhabi.
•	Kept project teams on-task with proactive control of budgets, schedules and scopes.
•	Provided all clients with high level of service and dedication in effort to extend relationships and promote future opportunities.
•	Completed thorough risk assessments and deployed management and response strategies to prevent roadblocks.
•	Led team of 5 geospatial professionals meeting survey engineering needs.
•	Generated reports to assess performance and make adjustments.
profile_positions.title: Senior survey manager | Digital Twins | drone surveys  | 3d laser scanning | GIS

profile_positions.description:
As Head of the Survey Department for Al Maktoum International Airport (Airfield and Infrastructure for Southside 723 AMIA project-15Million USD) my main responsibilities were:

• Responsible of all the survey works of overall area (landside and airside) for the construction of new aprons, new Taxiway, new Ground Support Equipment (GSE) road, the upgrade of existing aircraft stands and support infrastructure network works (Storm Water, Drainage, Sewage, MV, LV, ELV, AFL, Jet Fuel, PCA).
• Survey Project Planning and Management for Jet fuel, Storm water, Low Voltage, PCA, Airfield lighting, Firefighting Infrastructure networks as well as Runway Grading and Construction.
• Established and measured Control Geodetic Network for all Al Maktoum International Airport expansion Project.
• Responsible for company's survey equipment mobilization (according to projects' requirements).
• Earthworks Measurements, monthly progress report.
• Managed team of 25+ employees, overseeing hiring, training, and professional growth of employees.
• Used Microsoft Word and other software tools to create documents and other communications.
profile_positions.title: Head of Survey Department, airports and airfield infrastructure

profile_positions.description:
WEST YAS Project-140 Million USD. Notable Achievements:

•	Completed all Marine, road and Infrastructure Survey works for Yas West Project (140-million-euro project).
•	Monthly Drone Survey and 3D modeling deliverables (4 square kilometers area).
•	Survey Works of Waste Management Center of West Yas Academy, Micro-tunneling for Sewerage Pipe Connection, 2 Storm Water outfalls, 27 Electricity Power Distribution Substations and two temporary access roads for West Yas Academy.
•	Oversaw overall as built data acquisition and prepared monthly records using AutoCAD Civil 3D.
•	Responsible for Geodetic Network establishment /measurement.
•	Database creation for overall Storm water Network using ESRI ArcMap.
profile_positions.title: Marine and Infrastructure Survey Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Built and maintained GIS database by inputting field data, drawings, and project information for 3 projects.
•	Utilized ESRI's mobile mapping apps to collect field data.
•	Proficient in GIS analysis, documentation, and mapping.
•	Prepared engineering plans as directed by leading engineers through use of verbal instructions and blueprints.
•	Surveyed and analyzed terrain to determine optimum equipment placement and use.
•	Analyzed still and motion imagery and data (remote sensing) to produce geospatial intelligence for military operations.
•	Inspected quality of user-submitted geographical, topographical, and cartographic data required for integration into GIS maps and reports.
•	Created and modified high-resolution shapefiles appropriate for customer project specifications for use in GIS software interfaces.
